name: Baikal
description: CalDAV + CardDAV server and web client

scripts.unpack: bower install && npm install && grunt && cd web/apps/pulpy && npm install && cd ../buddies && npm install
scripts.dev: php app/console server:run 0.0.0.0:8000 --verbose --env=dev & cd web/apps/pulpy && grunt serve & cd web/apps/buddies && grunt serve & wait
scripts.build: php app/console cache:clear --env=prod && cd web/apps/pulpy && grunt build && cd ../buddies && grunt build && cd ../../.. && grunt

author: Net Gusto / Jérôme Schneider
